comment: Has anyone out there ever figured out how to classify a Black IPA. This recipe falls within all the property ranges for an American IPA, except for color. This beer grades out at 38*L just a 23 degrees darker than the darkest a conforming American IPA can be. I feel good that all the other components are within the range for the style of beer.
An update to the BJCP style guidelines are coming out soon and from what I have heard Black IPA will be a new subcategory under American IPA.
